pageContext.claim: “The Federal Reserve should get our interest rates down to ZERO, or less, and we should then start to refinance our debt. INTEREST COST COULD BE BROUGHT WAY DOWN, while at the same time substantially lengthening the term.”
pageContext.analysis: With this comment, Trump demonstrates little understanding of federal finances. Government debt cannot be refinanced like mortgages. Treasury bonds promise a fixed yield until maturity. The government could issue new bonds and buy the old bonds back, but this wouldn't reduce interest payments at all.
